numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the current generation has high hopes.
2. The current generation believes that the world is becoming a better place.
3. I notice that many people who are 40 years old or older do not have the same positive attitude.
4. I notice that Indonesia has the highest rate of people who believe that the world is becoming a better place.
5. I notice that this rate is highest in Indonesia in each generation.
6. I wonder why Indonesia has the highest rate.
7. I ask what about the population of Indonesia makes these people feel this way.
8. I ask what about the perspective of these people makes these people feel this way.
9. I wonder why younger people believe this statement more than older people.
10. I am part of the younger population.
11. This information is reassuring to me.
12. My views are similar to the views of people who are close to my age.
14. I know many people who are 40 years old or older.
15. I say that the views of these people differ from the graph.
16. Many parents that I know have negative thoughts about today's generation.
17. The headline is: Will the younger generation lead the world better than last generations?
